summary: Medieval Dunark's ruling family is murdered and the heir found with a bloody dagger. As the witch Shamer can't shame the heir to admit, the Shamer's daughter is fetched, as she, too, can make people see their shameful acts.
cast: Roland Møller|Jakob Oftebro|Søren Malling|Maria Bonnevie|Allan Hyde|Joi Johannsson|Peter Plaugborg|Stina Ekblad|Henrik Noël Olesen|Laura Bro|Jim High|Jakub Nemcok|Esben Dalgaard Andersen|Rebecca Emilie Sattrup|Adam Ild Rohweder|Olaf Johannessen|Mads Riisom|Niklas Herskind|Lado Hadzic|Curtis Matthew|Austa Lea Jespersen|Petra Maria Scott|Petra Scott Nielsen|Jaques Lauritsen|Mylena Barrios|Selma Iljazovski|Stefania Omarsdottir|Juliana Moska|Svend Johansen|Oliver Methling Søndergaard|Malthe Jagd Miehe-Renard|Osvald Boisen|Adél Frejová|Julie Knuth Brøllund Hansen|Lucie Furmanová|Michael Hamory|Matej Trochta
keywords: strong female lead|heroine|strong female character|sword and sorcery|child gagged
title: El reino de Dunark
